name: Tavern Heroes
description:
This game was made as a capstone project made up of 16 people in the span of 6 months. It's an match 3 rpg in which you combine different gems to create effects like attacking, healing or other statuses. There are several character to choose from like:

  1. Viking: Special Gems - Empower: Increase the amount of the next gem by the amount of Empower gems previously used.
  2. Wizard: Special Gems - Bubble Shield: Creates an overshield that protects you from the next attack.
  3. Witch: Special Gems - Eldritch Blast: High damage attack that costs a bit of health to cast.
  4. Archer: Special Gems - Poison Arrow: Makes target have  stacking lingering damage that hits each turn.
  5. Pixie: Special Gems - Weakening Bolt: Reduces enemy damage for one turn in return of very low damage.
